entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -19.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Coral Harbour Airport 10:00 PM EST Saturday 25 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -19.4°C

Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 81 %
Wind Chill: -32
Dewpoint: -21.8°C

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 21. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM EST Saturday 25 March 2023
